thread.title: Flag Football Is More Dangerous for Children Than You Think
thread.title_full: Flag Football Is More Dangerous for Children Than You Think - WSJ

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Flag Football Is More Dangerous for Children Than You Think
text:
Maybe flag football isnâ€™t a safer alternative for youngsters after all.
Flag football, which has surged in popularity along with parental concerns about the effects of tackling on children and young teens, actually produces higher injury rates for those players, according to a study by University of Iowa researchers.

The silver lining:...
